source/include/boost/config/compiler/visualc.hpp

00012 
00013 //  Microsoft Visual C++ compiler setup:
00014 
00015 #define BOOST_MSVC _MSC_VER
00016 
00017 // turn off the warnings before we #include anything
00018 #pragma warning( disable : 4503 ) // warning: decorated name length exceeded
00019 
00020 #if _MSC_VER <= 1200  // 1200 == VC++ 6.0
00021 #pragma warning( disable : 4786 ) // ident trunc to '255' chars in debug info
00022 #  define BOOST_NO_DEPENDENT_TYPES_IN_TEMPLATE_VALUE_PARAMETERS
00023 #  define BOOST_NO_VOID_RETURNS
00024 #  define BOOST_NO_EXCEPTION_STD_NAMESPACE
00025    // disable min/max macro defines on vc6:
00026    //
00027 #endif
00028 
00029 #if (_MSC_VER <= 1300)  // 1300 == VC++ 7.0
00030 
00031 #if !defined(_MSC_EXTENSIONS) && !defined(BOOST_NO_DEPENDENT_TYPES_IN_TEMPLATE_VALUE_PARAMETERS)      // VC7 bug with /Za
00032 #  define BOOST_NO_DEPENDENT_TYPES_IN_TEMPLATE_VALUE_PARAMETERS
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 #  define BOOST_NO_EXPLICIT_FUNCTION_TEMPLATE_ARGUMENTS
00036 #  define BOOST_NO_INCLASS_MEMBER_INITIALIZATION
00037 #  define BOOST_NO_PRIVATE_IN_AGGREGATE
00038 #  define BOOST_NO_ARGUMENT_DEPENDENT_LOOKUP
00039 #  define BOOST_NO_INTEGRAL_INT64_T
00040 #  define BOOST_NO_DEDUCED_TYPENAME
00041 #  define BOOST_NO_USING_DECLARATION_OVERLOADS_FROM_TYPENAME_BASE
00042 
00043 //    VC++ 6/7 has member templates but they have numerous problems including
00044 //    cases of silent failure, so for safety we define:
00045 #  define BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATES
00046 //    For VC++ experts wishing to attempt workarounds, we define:
00047 #  define BOOST_MSVC6_MEMBER_TEMPLATES
00048 
00049 #  define BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATE_FRIENDS
00050 #  define BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00051 #  define BOOST_NO_CV_VOID_SPECIALIZATIONS
00052 #  define BOOST_NO_FUNCTION_TEMPLATE_ORDERING
00053 #  define BOOST_NO_USING_TEMPLATE
00054 #  define BOOST_NO_SWPRINTF
00055 #  define BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_TEMPLATES
00056 #  define BOOST_NO_SFINAE
00057 #  if (_MSC_VER > 1200)
00058 #     define BOOST_NO_MEMBER_FUNCTION_SPECIALIZATIONS
00059 #  endif
00060 
00061 #endif
00062 
00063 #if _MSC_VER < 1310 // 1310 == VC++ 7.1
00064 #  define BOOST_NO_SWPRINTF
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 #if _MSC_VER <= 1310
00068 #  define BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATE_FRIENDS
00069 #endif
00070 
00071 #ifndef _NATIVE_WCHAR_T_DEFINED
00072 #  define BOOST_NO_INTRINSIC_WCHAR_T
00073 #endif
00074 
00075 //   
00076 // check for exception handling support:   
00077 #ifndef _CPPUNWIND   
00078 #  define BOOST_NO_EXCEPTIONS   
00079 #endif 
00080 
00081 //
00082 // __int64 support:
00083 //
00084 #if (_MSC_VER >= 1200)
00085 #   define BOOST_HAS_MS_INT64
00086 #endif
00087 #if (_MSC_VER >= 1310) && defined(_MSC_EXTENSIONS)
00088 #   define BOOST_HAS_LONG_LONG
00089 #endif
00090 //
00091 // disable Win32 API's if compiler extentions are
00092 // turned off:
00093 //
00094 #ifndef _MSC_EXTENSIONS
00095 #  define BOOST_DISABLE_WIN32
00096 #endif
00097 
00098 //
00099 // all versions support __declspec:
00100 //
00101 #define BOOST_HAS_DECLSPEC
00102 //
00103 // prefix and suffix headers:
00104 //
00105 #ifndef BOOST_ABI_PREFIX
00106 #  define BOOST_ABI_PREFIX "boost/config/abi/msvc_prefix.hpp"
00107 #endif
00108 #ifndef BOOST_ABI_SUFFIX
00109 #  define BOOST_ABI_SUFFIX "boost/config/abi/msvc_suffix.hpp"
00110 #endif
00111 
00112 # if _MSC_VER == 1200
00113 #   define BOOST_COMPILER_VERSION 6.0
00114 # elif _MSC_VER == 1300
00115 #   define BOOST_COMPILER_VERSION 7.0
00116 # elif _MSC_VER == 1310
00117 #   define BOOST_COMPILER_VERSION 7.1
00118 # else
00119 #   define BOOST_COMPILER_VERSION _MSC_VER
00120 # endif
00121 
00122 #define BOOST_COMPILER "Microsoft Visual C++ version " BOOST_STRINGIZE(BOOST_COMPILER_VERSION)
00123 
00124 //
00125 // versions check:
00126 // we don't support Visual C++ prior to version 6:
00127 #if _MSC_VER < 1200
00128 #error "Compiler not supported or configured - please reconfigure"
00129 #endif
00130 //
00131 // last known and checked version is 1310:
00132 #if (_MSC_VER > 1310)
00133 #  if defined(BOOST_ASSERT_CONFIG)
00134 #     error "Unknown compiler version - please run the configure tests and report the results"
00135 #  else
00136 #     pragma message("Unknown compiler version - please run the configure tests and report the results")
00137 #  endif
00138 #endif
